original_text: So the Lord says to you, “I will remove you from this earth. You have taught people to turn against me, the Lord. You will certainly die this year.” ’
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 내가 너를 지면에서 제하리니 네가 여호와께 패역한 말을 하였음이라 네가 금년에 죽으리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: So the Lord says to you
I will remove you from this earth
You have taught people to turn against me
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나 주를 배반하도록 사람들을 가르쳤다

sentences.original_text: You will certainly die this year
